chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Pattern Groans
chapters.info: Seonid Traighan, p. 87—Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She grew up in Cairhien, and is very business-like. She was part of Salidar's embassy to Rand. She now travels with Perrin and company. She has two Warders. She has pale skin, and is described as “diminutive.”
